name: Arcade games collection
description:
Have you ever thought ... why there are no different games, weird games, or better saying games so crazy that it is supposed to be fun, that's why I created this package. Totally casual games, more with a touch of originality






CAULIFLOWER-Imagine the most crazy game in the world, that's how CAULIFLOWER was born, a game where you control a cauliflower, and you have to defeat a legion of fruits, visit more than 12 most crazy levels in the world, and try to defeat as many fruits as possible !!









Porta 100-A different game, there is no combat, there are no challenges, the only thing you have to do is be lucky ... Port 100 is about a game where we have a single objective ... find port 100, among more 500 doors, each floor a key that can only be seen with the flashlight ... without the key you cannot enter the doors, each choice of door, may or may not lead you to door 100, wrong choices, can make you come back for the only one in the game or for places where port 100 will never be found ... Everything in this game will depend on your choices !!









New dark-A game with the most complicated puzzles in the world ... everything in this game is about keys and mixing keys to discover new keys ... sometimes you have to go back to the same place several times !! the keys are all hidden, but they are not always the right ones



















DONOUT ATTACK -How about remembering those nokia 3000 games, more with a different idea, where you control a ship and have to defeat as much donout as possible !!








DEATH VIRUS- no matter where you are, viruses will always be there, it's up to you to defeat them !!







BITMAM 3-one of my most original game ideas, Bitmam a secret agent, in this game for you to defeat enemies, you need the right color !!






KANGEL-you are not prepared for this game ... considered the most difficult in the world by myself ... face 4 levels with countless obstacles and try to reach the end !!





RUN AND SHOOT-A differentiated runner, where the goal is not just to run, but to shoot ... control from a simple character, to a hamburger, or even a pizza ... one of the crazy games for you to have fun and try to score a lot !!
